text: The 1927 Arizona Wildcats football team represented the University of Arizona as an independent during the 1927 college football season. In their 13th season under head coach Pop McKale, the Wildcats compiled a 4–2–1 record and outscored their opponents, 165 to 59. The team captain was Martin Gentry. ==Schedule== ==References== Arizona Category:Arizona Wildcats football seasons Arizona Wildcats football team
title: 1927 Arizona Wildcats football team
